existing.description: Open your existing wallet using Ledger, a private key, or your mnemonic phrase.

create.description: Create a brand new wallet to send, receive, stake and swap ROSE tokens

openWallet.header: How do you want to open your wallet ?

mnemonic.instruction: Enter your 12, 18 or 24 words keyphrase below, each words separated by spaces.
mnemonic.error: Invalid keyphrase. Please make sure to input the words in the right order, all lowercase.

privateKey.instruction: Enter your base-64 encoded private key

createWallet.instruction: Save your keyphrase <1>in the right order</1> in a secure location, you will need it to open your wallet.
createWallet.doNotShare: Never share your keyphrase, anyone with your keyphrase can access your wallet and your tokens.

confirmMnemonic.pickWord: Pick the right word corresponding to word #{{index}}

transaction.loadingError: Couldn't load transactions. List may be empty or out of date.

sendTransaction.success: Transaction successfully sent. The transaction might take up to a minute to appear on your account.

account.loadingError: Couldn't load account. Information may be missing or out of date.

validator.loadingError: Couldn't load transactions. List may be empty or out of date.

errors.usbTransportError: USB Transport error: {{message}}. This usually means your browser does not support WebUSB. Try using a Chromium-based browser and check application permissions.
errors.ledgerAppVersionNotSupported: Could not open Oasis App on Ledger, make sure it is unlocked and that the Oasis App is opened, and up to date.
errors.ledgerNoDeviceSelected: No ledger device selected. If your device was not selectable, make sure it is connected and <0>fix any USB connection issues with Ledger</0>.
errors.ledgerCannotOpenOasisApp: Could not open Oasis App on Ledger, make sure it is unlocked and that the Oasis App is opened.

preview.warning: Once you confirm this transaction you will not be able to cancel it. Carefully review it, and confirm once you are sure that you want to send it.

types.addEscrow: Delegating your tokens to a validator and generate rewards
types.reclaimEscrow: Reclaiming your tokens delegated to a validator
types.transfer: Transferring tokens from your account to another

fatalError.instruction: A fatal unexpected error has occurred and Oasis-wallet must stop. Please copy report this issue below on our <0>github account</0>. You can also try refreshing page to see if the issue persists. Once you leave this page, all of your wallets will be closed.
fatalError.heading: A fatal error occurred

footer.github: Oasis Wallet is fully <0>open source</0> - Feedback and issues are appreciated!
